description.value:
A Catchall of texts considered Blasphemous by the Imperium of Man, they may simply be cautions on Imperial Policies, they could also be in-depth heretical ritual guides and mind-numbing Chaos scrawls. Its use Grants +20 to Social Skill Tests such as Intimidation, Charm, and Decieve that are relevent to the Text's Contents at GM Discretion.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: -
